english.segment1: I am an instrument of the living God. My life a melody to His name. More than the songs I sing. Worship is everything. I live to glorify my King
english.segment2: Hear the song of my life. Let it be a sweet, sweet sound. Let it be a sweet, sweet sound. I raise this anthem high. Let it be a sweet, sweet sound. Let it be a sweet, sweet sound
english.segment3: Through all the mire and clay. You're washing me with grace. You carry me, oh Lord, through it all. So I will testify even in the fire. I live to praise my Savior
english.segment4: Hear the song of my life. Let it be a sweet, sweet sound. Let it be a sweet, sweet sound. I raise this anthem high. Let it be a sweet, sweet sound. Let it be a sweet, sweet sound
english.segment5: Let everything that has breath. Praise the Lord, Praise the Lord. And all creation will sing Hallelujah
english.segment6: Hear the song of my life. Let it be a sweet, sweet sound. Let it be a sweet, sweet sound. I raise this anthem high
english.segment7: Let it be a sweet, sweet sound. Let it be a sweet, sweet sound
english.segment8: (Let it be a sweet, sweet sound).
